bibl.title: Sei frammenti greci inediti biblici e classici – Studies in Greek and Byzantine Texts Presented to Jacques Noret for his Sixty-Fifth Birthday. Études de patristique grecque et textes byzantins offerts à Jacques Noret à l’occasion de ses soixante-cinq ans
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - 1. Some false occurrences in Hellenistic literature. - 2. The earliest occurrences in Greek literature. - 3. The earliest papyrological occurrences [includes corrections to: P.S.I. VI, 688; - P. Fam. Tebt. 47; - P. Oxy. XLIII, 3090; - XLII, 3066]. - 4. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: 145.4 P. Fam. Tebt. 47 P. Oxy. XLII, 3066; XLIII, 3090 P.S.I. VI, 688
CLARYSSE Willy, On the Early History of the Verb ἀπομένω.

B. JANSSENS, B. ROOSEN and P. VAN DEUN (Edd.), Philomathestatos. Studies in Greek and Byzantine Texts Presented to Jacques Noret for his Sixty-Fifth Birthday. Études de patristique grecque et textes byzantins offerts à Jacques Noret à l'occasion de ses soixante-cinq ans = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 137 (Leuven, 2004) pp. 57-61, 3 figg.

[Introduction.] - 1. Some false occurrences in Hellenistic literature. - 2. The earliest occurrences in Greek literature. - 3. The earliest papyrological occurrences [includes corrections to: P.S.I. VI, 688; - P. Fam. Tebt. 47; - P. Oxy. XLIII, 3090; - XLII, 3066]. - 4. Conclusion.
